text: [Music]
this is Media to Cloud a solution
architecture that allows us to apply the
Amazon recognition pre-trained apis to
videos and images
if we look at the settings for media to
Cloud we'll see that we can apply all of
the core recognition apis
which are pre-trained services that rely
on models that AWS has built to detect
things like celebrities faces moderation
text Etc we can also apply transcription
to the transcribed API we can look for
key phrases and sentiment through the
comprehend API and we can look at OCR
from the text direct API
today we're going to use media to Cloud
as a way to demonstrate the content
moderation version 6 API I'll play a
video that we've analyzed with media to
Cloud
we can clearly see that the early part
of the video contains alcohol and our
one frame per second analysis that we've
chosen shows alcohol throughout the
sequence next we'll move to a gambling
sequence also property detected
next a tobacco sequence with a cigar
that's smoking but notice that in a more
challenging sequence which has a
cinnamon stick smoking we correctly
predicted only alcohol in the result
finally a knife held in a threatening to
pose is detected as violence but a
similar knife in a kitchen setting with
the same grip is not detected as
violence so you can see that the content
moderation version 6 API is very good at
challenging scenarios with such as this
one where we properly detected alcohol
in the glass but did not detect the
smoking cinnamon stick as a cigar
[Music]
